markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Web Lurker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=407)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Web lurkers, known also as ettercaps, are ugly monsters that not only dwell within the lairs of spiders and swarms, but actively cultivate and shepherd such vermin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/WebLurker.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Web Lurker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=407)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 325</row>

**Perception** +10; darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet (creatures touching its web)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); spider speak

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Spider Speak** The web lurker can speak with spiders, with the same effects and limitations as [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Spring upon Prey** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature touches the web lurker’s web while the web lurker is on it. **Requirement** Initiative has not yet been rolled. **Effect** The web lurker automatically notices the creature and Strides or Climbs before rolling initiative.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +11 ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing plus web lurker venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web +11,
**Damage** web trap

**Web Lurker Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 19; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison and flat-footed (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison, flat-footed, and slowed 1 (1 round)

**Web Trap**   A creature hit by the web lurker’s web attack is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it succeeds at DC 20 Acrobatics check to Escape.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_3_Locations.png">Web Lurker Lair</title>

Whether alone or in a group, web lurkers hunt in forests, swamps, or scrubby hill lands, constructing structures from their webs high up in trees or within craggy, high canyons, and they surround their territory with traps and snares constructed of the same webbing and natural material.
</aside>
name: Web Lurker
